nodes.text: Nuun Pargen was a male Human captain of the Crescent.

Nuun took off Naboo aboard the Crescent in 32 BBY. While he was trying to leave the planet, his ship was attacked and damaged by Trade Federation Droid starfighters, Nuun managed to make an emergency landing outside the city of Theed, on the Great Grass Plains, but his daughter, Inea, was wounded during the attack.
